It is located in the heart of Getsemaní, It is close to different attractive places of the city walking. area of the very colourful walled sector. The plaza of the trinity, the most important in the zone, is just one block away, a square where locals gather every night, with travellers (national and foreign) passing through the city, and where it is common to find typical local food, as well as as varied forms of cultural expression such as live music, dances and street theatre.

Hotel El Pedregal that offers private and shared rooms, all with windows, air conditioning, some with fridge and TV. There is free daily cleaning service. It offers a shared equipped kitchen, laundry service, a terrace with a beautiful view towards the city, free wireless internet access and tourist information. The reception service is 24 hours.

El Pedregal has air-conditioned rooms with a cable TV and city views. All rooms have private bathrooms, a ceiling fan and a refrigerator.
At El Pedregal, guests are only a 5-minute walk from Cartagena's historical quarter and from San Felipe's Castle. Cerro de la Popa is 1 km away and the tour desk can arrange car or bicycle rental.
This property is 8 minutes' drive from the beach area and from Rafael Nunez International Airport. The Convention Center is 5 minutes' walk away.

description.description: El Pedregal is a colonial house that offers private and shared rooms all with air conditioning. The hotel is decorated with a mix of old, artisan and modern elements that make it unique and the best thing is its cosy atmosphere. Located in Gethsemane Walled City and surrounded by native families, the hotel offers a panoramic roof top sun terrace and free WiFi. Trinidad Square is 1 block away.
